1698.00.text: that it's all... Everything leaks. So much stuff

1701.00.text: goes on that is secret that isn't kept, so you know, you can say

1704.00.text: conspiracy theory all you want but it just doesn't make sense.

1708.00.text: Will the world at large ever know 100% of the story?

1712.00.text: Probably not, because we have to be able to protect

1715.00.text: the way we do our job.

1717.00.text: Bringing Bin Laden to justice was a very significant battle

1722.00.text: in this war... It was not the end of the war.

1725.00.text: It was just a very significant victory in that war.
